trans-unit.source: Shows the version of the on-disk data in the database. The version is the first two numbers (the major and minor release values) in a <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> release identifier. For newly created databases and for soft-upgraded databases, this is the release identifier of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> engine jar used to create the database. For fully upgraded databases, this is the release identifier of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> engine jar used to perform a full upgrade of the database. See <xref href="rrefattribupgrade.dita#rrefattribupgrade"></xref> for more information about upgrading databases.

seg-source.mrk: Shows the version of the on-disk data in the database.
The version is the first two numbers (the major and minor release values) in a <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> release identifier.
For newly created databases and for soft-upgraded databases, this is the release identifier of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> engine jar used to create the database.
For fully upgraded databases, this is the release identifier of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> engine jar used to perform a full upgrade of the database.
See <xref href="rrefattribupgrade.dita#rrefattribupgrade"></xref> for more information about upgrading databases.

target.mrk: Shows the version of the on-disk data in the database.
The version is the first two numbers (the major and minor release values) in a <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> release identifier.
For newly created databases and for soft-upgraded databases, this is the release identifier of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> engine jar used to create the database.
For fully upgraded databases, this is the release identifier of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> engine jar used to perform a full upgrade of the database.
See <xref href="rrefattribupgrade.dita#rrefattribupgrade"></xref> for more information about upgrading databases.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the value of this property by using the <xref href="rrefgetdbpropfunc.dita#rrefgetdbpropfunc"></xref>, but you cannot change it.

seg-source.mrk: You can retrieve the value of this property by using the <xref href="rrefgetdbpropfunc.dita#rrefgetdbpropfunc"></xref>, but you cannot change it.

target.mrk: You can retrieve the value of this property by using the <xref href="rrefgetdbpropfunc.dita#rrefgetdbpropfunc"></xref>, but you cannot change it.
